info.name: Dark skin for TabGroupBar addon
info.description: Dark skin for TabGroupBar Firefox addon (extension).
info.additionalInfo:
21/03/2014 - updated to most recent development version (available on github); if you're having problems with occasional missing tab groups after start you can try my fork of this addon/extension - https://github.com/mnn/Tab-Group-Bar
07/03/2014 - released
